name: TankUnityTutorial
description:
well i tried

im not really looking for feedback its too early to release demo but i did it anyways

the enemies dont even damage you

only the tank works

64bit windows only

turrets have 1 HP

"boss" has 2 HP

the game closes itself when "boss" "dies"

camera is controlled with numpad but you shouldnt need to control it

use WASD to move

only Switch Target/Player, Attack and Quit Game buttons should work
